findings.rationale: The confidentiality obligations last only three years, which may expose sensitive information after this period.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect for three (3) years from the date of execution, after which the obligations shall terminate.

findings.rationale: The contract does not specify the consequences or remedies available in the event of a breach, which may lead to unaddressed violations.
findings.evidence_quote: Each party agrees to maintain the confidentiality of the other party's Confidential Information...
